ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: using arrow keys to scroll through lookup or rollup values reports an error in cell
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? 1. create a table A with rows 2. create a table B with a `LinkToAnotherRecord` to A. Add at least one row of A to this column. 3. create a `Lookup` column in B and pick a column of A. 4. highlight the cell and move around using the arrow keys, an error will show up. ### Desired Behavior No error. ### Project Details ``` Node: **v16.17.1** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.100.2** ``` ### Attachements

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): treat empty string as null for number fields re #4701 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): lookup and rollup - show readonly warning only when necessary re #4702 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
